content: this toe-up ankle sock pattern is the perfect everyday sock knit from the toe up these socks are simple fast and easy to customize the design is plain enough to show off self-striping yarns like premier yarns fruits affiliate link 1 but works beautifully with tonals and solids too toe-up socks are great for trying on as you knit using every last yard of yarn adjusting cuff length easily beginner-friendly sock knitting techniques used judy s magic cast on m1r/m1l kfb pfb ssk k2tog these socks are the toe-up version of my popular vanilla ankle socks created after many requests from knitters who wanted a toe-up option 1 https //premier-yarns pxf io/yraj6k
